General.Name: Integrated Rail and Resources Acquisition Corp.
General.Description: Integrated Rail and Resources Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in railroad companies in North America. Integrated Rail and Resources Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Winter Park, Florida.
General.Address: 6100 Southwest Boulevard, Fort Worth, TX, United States, 76109
